item.title: on bringing the laptop into the shop for repairs
item.description: My Mac is in the shop. It's getting a new wifi card, and while they are at it they'll replace the chipped case. The chip fixing means that labor is free for the wifi fixing so it's a very reasonable cost. The last time I had any kind of extended computer downtime I remember it being a strain, since I then had so much of my personal computing stuff actually on my computer.

item.title: art on a shovel, some sources: metalworking
item.description: Getting ready for a February art on a shovel project ("shovel ready!"). Here's some sources of inspiration. Masks from recycled shovel blades, John T. Unger. Plasma cut steel shovels, Cal Lane. Shovel art, Texas Lone Star, Iron Signs and Designs. Each of these involve some serious metalworking, generally with round point dirt shovel as the starting point.
